statements: DELETE FROM ArchitecturalFirm WHERE project_name = 'New Building Project';
DELETE FROM ArchitecturalFirm WHERE project_id = 101 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ArchitecturalFirm WHERE actual_cost > estimated_cost OR end_date < '2023-06-01';
DELETE FROM projects WHERE project_name = 'Project X' AND client_name = 'Client ABC';
DELETE FROM CostEstimation WHERE project_id = 100 AND total_cost > 50000;
DELETE FROM materials WHERE quantity < 5 AND unit_price > 100.00;
DELETE FROM architects WHERE architect_name = 'John Smith';
